𝟏𝟐𝟓𝟎𝐖 𝐏𝐑𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐔𝐑𝐈𝐙𝐄𝐃 𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐀𝐌 𝐂𝐋𝐄𝐀𝐍𝐄𝐑: Loosen dirt and steam your living space with this Puetz Golf Pressurized Steam Cleaner. With features like 360-degree cleaning angle, this 1250W pressurized steam cleaner maneuvers easily.

𝐋𝐀𝐑𝐆𝐄 𝐂𝐀𝐏𝐀𝐂𝐈𝐓𝐘 𝐖𝐀𝐓𝐄𝐑 𝐓𝐀𝐍𝐊: This steamer for cleaning contains a large 16.06 oz tank to hold water with a recommended capacity of 12.7 oz saves you time as you won’t need to stop and refill your water tank as often. An easy-to-press trigger lets you quickly sanitize your appliances and fabrics.
𝐒𝐄𝐂𝐔𝐑𝐄 𝐒𝐀𝐅𝐄𝐓𝐘 𝐋𝐎𝐂𝐊 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐂𝐀𝐏: Feel secure with a safety lock and cap on this handheld steam cleaner. Use the smart lock to keep the trigger inaccessible to kids, pets or clumsiness.

𝐀𝐋𝐋 𝐈𝐍 𝐎𝐍𝐄 𝐂𝐋𝐄𝐀𝐍𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐓𝐎𝐎𝐋: This multipurpose handheld steam cleaner includes 14-in-1 cleaning capabilities like a window cleaning tool, an ironing brush, a brush cloth, 3 round nylon brushes, a round iron brush, a bent nozzle, a straight nozzle, an extension hose, a measuring cup, a funnel and two microfiber cleaning cloths.
𝐄𝐗𝐓𝐑𝐀 𝐋𝐎𝐍𝐆 𝐂𝐎𝐑𝐃: Our pressurized handheld steam cleaner has an extra-long 16ft power cord lets you move around a room and deep clean more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how this works. Cleans well. Perfect for home use. For commercial use you’d need something more powerful but this feels safe and effective to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love that this is easy to use and allows the use of detergent.
reviews.reviewText: This combines detergent and steam to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Deep Cleaning-Warranty need to be Honored
reviews.reviewText: Good Product, it helps for deep cleaning. They need to honor the warranty. The product stopped working within year and they are sending a replacement as warranty is for 2 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This didn’t work for my bathroom
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to get this product, and before I go into my review, I do want to comment on the customer service. The company selling this product will reach out before you even get it in the mail to send you helpful tips and documentation. I give an A+ effort on their part. They sent me a couple of emails right after purchase and right after it arrived in the mail.It took me a month or so before I finally unboxed this item to try it out and now the return window has closed, but if I could return it, I would. It didn’t do much. I was so excited to try to steam the grout between the tiles in my shower or the caulk lining at the bottom edges of the shower, or even just the shower floor itself. I was thinking finally, I will get some of these spots looking brighter and whiter and restored. I tried and tried. I even added detergent to the water. Nothing worked. Nothing became cleaner than it was before.So like my title of this review says, I’m not sure what this is meant to clean. Maybe it would be easier to clean surfaces like floors or something? I have no idea. But that would take a lot of time to clean a floor with this.I hope this review helps someone. I am simply speaking the story that happened for me. This product probably does work for other purposes, but I specifically bought it to use for cleaning the bathroom and I had difficulties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best gift ever....
reviews.reviewText: My son gave me this steam cleaner as a gift. It is amazing. No more streaks when you clean any windows be it home or car. This machine will take your bathroom cleaning to a new level. Shower and shower doors sparkle! I Also, I just used it to clean the inside of my refridgerator. Amazing! We all have knick knacks sitting around our homes and eventually they collect dust. A short spray of stream and a soft cloth makes such a difference. Since I have received my machine, 5 other family members have bought one and are as pleased as I am.Mary Kay Scherer Moore

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works good but beware of warranty card!
reviews.reviewText: There was a card in the box saying "24 month warranty card" but no instructions on activating or registering the product. I wrote the seller and got the response that if I left a 5 star review, sent them a screen shot of it THEN they'd give me a 24 month warranty. I told them that I review as I see fit and cannot be bought. I probably would have given this at least 4 stars except for the con on the warranty. I've only used it once but it put out a LOT of steam and did a good job.I had a little trouble putting the cap back on after filling. I'm not sure if the threads are a hair off or if it was me. The other problem is that is is poorly balanced and very easily tips over. You have to be very careful with the attachments (I used long hose). If it isn't on exactly right and locked...which I thought it was...it pops off. I can live with these issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great steam cleaner
reviews.reviewText: I used my Handheld Steam Cleaner today & oh yes, it is a keeper.Easy to use & my window & the screens both are sparkling clean! I clean one couch came out great &also cleaned all my kitchen counters worked perfect. You do have to wait 5 mins or so before you refill but that is no problem because I used that time to wipe things down. The only problem is once you start to use it is hard to stop! I wanted to steam clean my entire house but that will come with time. Excellent product so far & I would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Invaluable cleaning tool
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this steamer for one main big issue at our seasonal home. We purchased this condo which was about 7 years old. One of the showers has bone coloured tiles and grout that was stained very badly with hard water stains and the glass door was totally covered from top to bottom with hard water stains and scale,that seemed an impossible thought it could be cleaned. I heard reviews of these steam cleaners, did some research on Amazon and due to the many positive reviews and the excellent price I decided to give this one a try. Well it took awhile to arrive to me due to a secondary transport company, but when I got it I went to town in the kitchen, the toilets everything and I was very impressed. Time to tackle the shower. I still was unsure of what would happen, so started with the tiles and grout. It did take awhile to get it clean. I used one of the included hard brushes and after an hour and a half the tiles were totally like new. All the discolorization had disappeared. It was a hard job, but it worked. I decided to tackle the glass door the next day. I got set up with the bristle brush and started in. Believe me I worked hard. I had to go little by little but after 2 hours, the entire door was completely clear of the hard scale. I was just so happy. I decided a week later I would do our floor to ceiling lined drapes. I got ready to go, plugged in the machine and nothing. The light did not come on...I moved to another plug, nothing. Got my manual out to troubleshoot, nothing. I got back on Amazon and looked though the screens and screens of reviews and found a couple of people with the same thing. I was upset because of where we are located with a return or resend but it was only used a few times and thought I would contact the seller. I managed to get a person at Amazon that got me set up to send a message to the seller. He answered by the next day and sent me out a replacement. What excellent customer service!! So my new one arrived to me a few weeks later, and today I fired it up. Redid the toilets, sinks, shower and one set of drapes. The drapes look great, I will tackle the rest this week. I hope I just had a lemon, and this little work hose will keep going. I plan on buying another one for our home when we leave here in 2 months. I will update this if anything changes. If you are thinking of getting a steamer, do it. Just makes you feel good having everything cleaned so well.

reviews.reviewTitle: No cumplió con mis expectativas. No ofrece lo que anuncia y describe
reviews.reviewText: No sirve para lo que ofrece. Seguí las instrucciones paso a paso. Aunque expulsa el vapor, con mucha ilusión intenté limpiar los baños usando los accesorios adecuados y no limpió nada; intenté limpiar la estufa de la cocina y tampoco limpió nada, lo intenté con las persianas de las cortinas de las ventanas y no limpió nada; lo intenté queriendo limpiar el tapiz de la sala y nada, solo mojaba, pasaba las toallas accesorias para intentar quitar la suciedad y nada; también lo hice sobre la herradura de aluminio de las ventanas y nada.Me pasé horas y horas, seis horas en total y nunca limpió nada, a pesar de que utilizé los accesorios y el vapor en cada una de las superficies las cuales tallé y tallé y sin lograr el mínimo efecto de limpieza deseado. Noté que del depósito de líquido de limpieza nunca lo expulsó, solo salía vapor pero no el líquido de limpieza por lo que el depósito al finalizar quedó lleno de este líquido.Tiene el inconveniente que aunque el vapor calienta casi de inmediato, éste se termina en muy pocos minutos, casi 5 minutos en cada llenado de agua en el depósito, después hay que esperar aproximadamente 10 a 15 minutos para que enfríe y volver a depositar agua dentro de él; esto quita mucho tiempo de espera para poder volver a iniciar el proceso de limpieza. Después de horas de intentar, aproximadamente 6 horas, ya decepcionado y cansado, opté mejor por limpiar las superficies descritas anteriormente de manera convencional, con un cepillo en mano, no los del limpiador comprado. Ya sin usar el aparato limpiador, cepillando con mi mano, limpiando con otras toallas y usando un producto líquido de limpieza y en tan solo 40 minutos logré limpiar todas las superficies que había intentado hacerlo con el aparato limpiador de vapor comprado el cual no funcionó para nada.Sólo gasté inútilmente al comprarlo y aunque busque la firma de cómo regresarlo a la tienda, no encontré la forma de hacerlo, así es que no me queda otra que quedarme con el limpiador de vapor como un recuerdo de una compra inútil.En verdad, no lo recomiendo para nada, no funciona para lo que describe. 😥
